title: Alex Bezuska
subtitle: Game Artist & Developer
author: Alex Bezuska
description: Alex Bezuska, Game Artist & Developer. 1/2 of Independant game studio Two Scoop Games. Co-founder and board member of game creation career and education advocate and 501(c)3 non profit Louisville Makes Games. Community organizer of JSLou, Louisville Kentucky's JavaScript community. Loving parent of many cats and chickens.
